reviews.review: Супер! Сюжет, идея, графика, музыка.  20 часов удовольствия. Хотя конечно такие игры нужно дублировать. Я хочу играть, а не читать субтитры. Так-что российские издатели поднасрали конкретно.
solid game, ending was written by a 12 old with aspergers
10/10 Swag.
Quite possibly one of the best games ive ever played!

This is not just a game, this is an actual masterpiece which can be compared to a well-written book or a blockbuster movie. I don't know, how much cocaine Ken Levine and his team used while making this game, but its beauty, gameplay and plot will literally blow your mind for the next dozen of hours. Especially I want to admit designers' work. This is one of the most beautiful games I've ever seen. 
Elizabeth out of 10, this one is an ABSOLUTE must have and is 100% worth it. You will not regret buying it, I promise.
Sehr würdiger Nachfolger der ersten beiden Teile, der (gerade auch mit den DLC´s) eine schöne Verbindung bzw. Vorgeschichte erzählt.

If your PC can run it on highest setting i'd strongly suggest doing so, cuz OMG this game is b-e-a-utiful even on medium settings, can't imagine what it's like in the highest.

Visuals aside. This game is quite interesting story wise, It's wierd not being in Rapture and truth be told it loses some of its fear factor found in the first 2 games (especially the 1st Bioshock). But you can get round this by getting the "Burial at Sea" DLC which i'm playing atm. 
One of the main theme's is that minefield called Religion, in some area's it certainly questions area's of religion which can be a little frustrating at times.

The game play is solid, although it you're used to playing the previous 2 it has changed slightly which takes a couple of levels to re-adjust. But on the whole its very nice.
Awesome. Beautiful and entertaining. Worth its cost in full!
awesome game!

While this game makes claims of being anti-racism,  the reality is that the player gets gets bombarded for hours-on-end by racist rhetoric through both audio and visual senses. 

While the developers of this game may not have intended to make a racist game under the guise of anti-racism; the game probably would not have turned out much differently if they did intend such.

I was only nine years old

I loved Shrek so much, I owned all the movies and merchandise

I pray to Shrek every night, thanking him for the life I have been given

"Shrek is love", I say, "Shrek is life"

My dad hears me and calls me a faggot

He is obviously jealous of my devotion to Shrek

I call him a cunt

He slaps me and sends me to my room

I am crying now, because my face hurts

I go into my bed and it is very cold

I feel a warmth moving towards me

 I fell something touch me

 It's Shrek!

 I am so happy

he whispers into my ear, "This is my swamp"

 He grabs me with his powerful ogre hands and puts me on my hands and knees

 I'm ready

 I spread my ass cheeks for Shrek

 He penetrates my butthole

 It hurts so much, but I do it for Shrek

 I can feel my anus tearing as my eyes start to water

 I push against his force

 I want to please Shrek

 He roars a mighty roar as he fills my butt with his love

 My dad walks in

Shrek looks him deep in the eyes and says, "It's all ogre now"

Shrek leaves through my window

Shrek is love, Shrek is life﻿

10/10
Definitely worthing game! Biggest mindblow game I've played!

A.) This game is absolutely beautiful and the gameplay is very fluid. I might actually want to play this game with no enemies at all just to have a liesurly stroll through beautiful scenery.

B.) As a tactical shooter I have to take issue with the fact that you don't lose any progress when you die. You can kill one enemy per-life and when you respawn the enemies are still dead. This takes away from the challenge of a good shooter where you struggle just to make it to the next check point. This detracts from the challenge of the game and earns it a big negative mark in my opinion.

C.) Story is pretty good, though I didn't finish.


All in all it's very arcadey but still fun. Don't expect this to be a real challenge since you can just die over and over, and over, and still not slow down your progress through the level. The only penalty for dying is that it costs some money, but you really don't need it that much anyways as elizabeth is always tossing you ammo and power-ups.

Всем рекомендую пройти этот шедевр , вcё понравиилось . Сам я являюсь огромным фанатом серии BioShock , прошёл все части , всё понравилочь ну и перейдём ксобственно к BioShock INFINITE . Игра выполнена в очень хорошем стиле все детали проработанны , сразу как мы попадаем в колумбию радует бурнасть красок ярких отъеннков , и ещё люди со слабыми компами можете неволнаваться игра на минимальных настройках выгледит неплохо , сам проверял но лучше конечно играть на мощном компе
Seulement un mot suffit pour décrire ce jeu : MAGNIFIQUE !

Ich war zufrieden...

Игра просто восхитительна! С самого начала и вплоть до конца она поражает вас своей атмосферой и глубиной сюжета. Наверное еще ни одна игра меня не доводила до мурашек(в прямом смысле этого слова) Концовка заставляет вас задуматься не только о всех предыдущих событиях, которые происходили в игре ранее, но и слегка поразмышлять над своей жизнью, что не каждой игре удается. ИГРА ГОДА!

1900年代初頭のアメリカを舞台に、歴史的・宗教的な要素を多く含むストーリーが展開されるのが、本作品の強烈な個性。
タイムパラドックスを何度も起こしながら真相とひとつの結論に迫っていくという展開は、何時間にもわたってダラダラと怠惰なプレイをしていても、ストーリー上重要な点だけは頭の片隅に刻み込んでくれます（体験談）。
プレイ中に頭の中で、「タイムパラドックスだ！」という某ゲームおなじみの台詞がたくさん流れる方もいることでしょう（笑）。

マイナス点は戦闘とプレイヤー強化の回りが目立つ程度で、その他は作りこみがいいのか私はほぼ感じませんでした。

そのマイナス点の代表例：
一度やられたら敵も体力がある程度回復　なのにシールドと体力が少ししかないので、復活後即やられるときがある
ペナルティで所持金のいくらかが没収　でも強化には大量に金がかかるから、プレイヤーが弱いままになりやすい
弾が大量に必要になるのに、その弾を所持できる量が少なくて戦闘が詰む（ただし、後半は相当緩和可能）

なんだBorderlands2と同じじゃねぇかと嘆くかもしれません。
作ったところが同じだし、あの2作より後に出たので悪影響が残っているといってしまえば、それまでという感はあります。
でも、あれほどバランスは崩れていません。
これはビガーとエリザベスのおかげです。実際に遊んでみれば、これら要素の働きの大きさに気がつくことでしょう。
特に後半になるほど実感します。

気になった方は、何はともあれ遊んでみることをおすすめします。

jeu très sympa dans son ensemble avec une belle ambiance à la fois science fiction et style années 1920, le gameplay est pas mal avec de bon graphisme. L'histoire contient un bon scénario très accrocheur de quoi rester jouer jusqu'à finir le jeu
Один из лучших шутеров последних лет. Реализм, кинематографичные катсцены и пафос убили "душу" современных FPS, и Infinite - приятное исключение.

Lives up to the original.  A well-thought out story that grabs you.  IMHO one of the best stories ever for a straight FPS.  One drawback is there didn't seem to be any minigames unlike the original.    Highly recommended otherwise.
Great game
This game is the best game of 2013. The story is as good as Red dead redemption, I love this game! Buy this game and I promise you that you will not regret it!

This is one of the most beautiful games I have ever played. In regards to atmosphere, Bioshock Infinite is perfect. The floating city is amazing, and just the feel of the town is great. The story, while it does have some possible loopholes, makes you think, which is more than most storylines today can acomplish. Elizabeth is the first character I genuinally cared about since Alyx from Half Life. She was always nice to listen to, never got in the way, and occisionally gives health and ammo. She is one of the best parts of this game. However, this game does lack in one category: gameplay. The only improvement here is the use of skyrails. Being able to glide around the city like that is nice. Every other part of the gameplay feels mediocre. The gun play is ok at best, and vigors are a lot like plasmids. Most of the vigors sound really cool, but personally I hardly ever even used them. Later on in the game you get the ability to create "tear" is the world, which can teleport supplies or other helpful things into the battlefield. This was under used, and rarly actually helped me. The last thing that really bugged me about this game is its lack of replayability. After you finish the main story, "1999 mode" unlocks. All this is, is another difficutly mode. It is suppose to make the game extremely diffictult. There is no multiplayer, no survival, nothing besides the mainstory. I finished this game in a little over 12 hours. This game is not worth full price. Its a good game, but only buy it if it is on sale.

Pros:
+Story
+Atmosphere
+Graphics
+Skyrails
+Characters

Neutral:
*Vigors
*Gameplay

Cons:
-Replayability

Overall: 8/10 The story and atmosphere are strong enough to hold up the gameplay, however this game simply doesnt provide enough. However, the few hours I got out of this game were all memorable, and I did like this game a lot. Buy this game when it is on sale, or wait for some kind of GOTY edition to come out.
It's a really a awesome game! :D

BioShock Infinite es, en mi opinión, el equivalente a la Illiada, Shakespeare o demás literatura atemporal a los videojuegos.

Un aspecto gráfico muy cuidado y simplemente maravilloso destacando las iluminaciones que hacen que se caiga la mandivula al suelo. El aspecto musical es genial, una musica que te introduce en el juego en cada momento, muy bien hecha y muy bien seleccionada.

Y, respecto a la história: Para mi, una obra maestra, probablemente de las mejores historias jamás escritas, solo podemos decir:
Gracias Ken Levine.

Muy recomendado, aunque este juego valiese 100 euros los mereceria.

I have to say, this is an absolutely amazing game. Everything about it is so detailed, making it seem like the developers put loads of time into sll of the little things. The story is also absolutely amazing. I'll try not to ruin anything but the ending will blow your mind. If you don't already have this game, buy it.

If some believe the art of exploritory linear story driven games is dying, then they must play this game (and all the DLC, cept maybe the skybattles). There were scenes in the game that were interactive visual masterpieces. The main game is just amazing and engaging. The second DLC was not only alot to take in (more so then the main title) but very visually emotional. This game is a extreamly positive step for the industry as a whole; meaning all devs and aspiring devs need to play this to exeriance the correct standards of a linear interactive narrative.

The most amazing game i've played. I cannot get enough of it. I've enjoyed every second of this game. The story is intense, the action is addictive and the music is beautiful and fitting. I've watched my brother play a few spots of the game and hearing him rant and rave about how amazing this was, I knew I had to get it myself. I've played it multiple times on both PC and PS3 and I'm still not over this game. If you enjoy a great story, adventure, gun/power play and beautiful views of gameplay, you surely will enjoy this one.
Get it NOW if you haven't already. Under $10 for the weekend.

realmente el juego, es hermoso en varios punto, desde que jugue la version de consola, ya estaba esperando por jugar la version de pc, por varios motivos, pero es un juego que no me a decepcionado en nada, por tener una  historia realmente exelente, con el primer bioshock me encanto esperaba la salida de esta entrega desde hace tiempo, y realmente espero que la gente se compre este juego para que tambien sineta una buena experiencia.

Partamos ya de estamos hablando de un juego, el cual 2K Games, tuvo el coraje de cambiar drasticamente todo, y dejando a la suerte de los fans si esta nueva entrega de Bioshock llegaria al mismo nivel de los demas. Dejando a un lado la idea de estar en una ciudad bajo el agua para pasar a los cielos. Bioschock Infinite a primera vista es un copia de sus dos juegos anteriores, podemos tener con una mano un arma y del otro lado un vigor (Anteriormente en Bioshock plasmidos) los cuales gastara sales (Anteriormente en Bioshock EVE), la jugabilidad de este juego es exelente,impecable, divertida y exitante por momentos, gracias a la nueva innovacion de los monorrieles, carriles de carga que podremos usar para escapar de enemigos, combatir sobre los mimos o trasladarnos por la nueva ciudad llamada Columbia. Si bien los vigores/plasmidos son una caracteristica importanete dentro del mundo de Bioshock, en esta nueva oportunidad no hace valer su nombre. Uno puede pasar absolutamente todo el juego sin haberlos usado, su utilidad es simplemente una minima ayuda dandole mas importancia a nuestras armas.Tomando el rol de Booker DeWitt, un personaje que por fin pueda dialogar e interactuar con otros personajes dentro de la saga de Bioshock, que debe pagar una deuda e ir en busqueda de una chica, viajamos a una ciudad llamada Columbia, la cual se encuentra MUCHISIMO mas viva que Rapture. Y esta es uno de los tantos buenos aspectos que tiene este gran juego, Columbia se siente llena de vida constantemente, dandonos la posiblidad de asombrarnos y ver las acciones de otros pesonajes. Dandonos en varias oportunidades momentos para simplemente recorrer los alrededores y admirar su belleza. Rapidamente tras encontrar a la chica llamada Elizabeth quien cumplira uno de los roles tal vez mas importates dentro de un juego, no solo en el trancurso que se vaya develando la historia sino tambien dentro de la jugabilidad, nos damos cuenta que Elizabeth puede alterar la realidad trayendo objetos de otras dimensiones a la nuestra y de que Columbia no es la utopia de nuestros sueños sino que esta en guerra entre dos facciones, por un lado se encuentra el profeta Comstock quien controla Columbia y por otro lado los rebeldes quienes son liderados por Fitzroy,por lo tanto nuestro objetivo principal es regresar con Elizabeth lo mas pronto posible a New York y pagar esta deuda .Elizabeth es un personaje carismatico y tal vez el mas vivo dentro de Columbia, caminando e investigando por su propia cuenta,mirando objetos, y hasta por momentos, a medida que avanza la historia su humor, forma de decir las cosas y verlas, cambiando gestos y formas de responder. Sin duda es uno de los mejores personajes que se han disfrutando dentro de un juego, pero el rol de Elizabeth no termina ahi. Elizabeth cumple otro rol muy importante el cual incumbe dentro de su jugabilidad, nos provee de municion y sales (necesarias para los vigores) en caso de escaseamos en medio de un combate, ademas de gracias a su poder de cambiar la realidad a su forma, poder traer objetos de otras dimensiones a la nuestra, ayudandonos asi en mas de una ocacion a evitar una muerte. Si bien la historia sufre de algunos tropiezos o recaidas y giros que son por momento confusos, raros, inentendibles a primera vista, y forzado desenlaze por momentos, Bioshock Infnite se coloca como uno de los mejores juegos de 2013 por su exelente jugabilidad, trama e historia  con varios giros que uno jamas se ve venir, y cada uno de sus personajes y como estan logrados hace del mismo una experiencia inolvidalbe. Bioshock Infinite obitiene un 9/10. Es un gran juego que merece ser jugado por cualquier gamer y jugador casual que no este familiarizado con esta saga.

By far one of the best games I've played in quite some time. Visually, the game is stunning. Unlike the previous Bioshock games, you're immersed into this bright, beautiful, almost flawless world with an incredible color palette, and as you progress and explore deeper into the world of Columbia, you'll start to see the color palette change as well. As the game reaches it's darkest points, the atmosphere will change along with it. Mechanically, the game is just as good. Great story, great combat, total mindfuck at the end. It taught me to always search trash cans because there's bound to be money there.
